name: Kingler
flavorText:
The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.flavorText:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.
